channel.title: Error Connecting To Server
channel.description: Hello everyone. I have my server hosted VPS 24/7. On my webclient or download client or whatever people use trying to log in, it says its offline. The only way to log in is to spam-click the log in button. Why does it do this? :\

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

Even on a different source, on VPS it is still doing this. Now it is about 5-10 clicks to log in though.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:10, topic:521026”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=639534.msg4310770#msg4310770 date=1370710791]

Does the server receive any connections from the first clicks?

Just about 20 minutes ago when I was on skype someone told me to get on. So I clicked it once and logged in. Logged out so I could try it again, and it took about 50 spam clicks to log in.

When it takes 50 spam clicks, does the server receive any connections from the first 49?
[/quote]

no[/quote]
Have you looked in the server console to confirm this? Insert a debug message into your login() method in the Client to see if the login method is being called correctly.

Read full topic

Just about 20 minutes ago when I was on skype someone told me to get on. So I clicked it once and logged in. Logged out so I could try it again, and it took about 50 spam clicks to log in.

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Solution: See about how many clicks it takes to log in (on average) and make it a game.

Yeah because that’s fun. lol. I will try with the jdk-blah-blah … Hopefully I can figure something out.

Read full topic
